k1 m1l p to marker p1 p to last two stitches m1r k1 ktb 127 sts in order to get a wide and shallow shawl you will need to start to cast on extra stitches at the beginning of some of the row this will mean that on some row your shawl will appear to be lop-sided i e you will have more stitches on one side of your centre stitch than on the other don t worry this will all work out in the end dragonfly
